RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since May 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250 (Claiming races for $4,000 or less not c onsidered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: C C'S WORLD saved ground while racing close to the pace, awaited room on the turn, angled out at the top of the stretch, closed willingly, dueled late and proved best. SEQUAYA vied inside to the stretch, inched away for a short lead, responded to duel in deep stretch and was outfinished in a good effort. BELLS OF JOY vied two across to the turn, fell back, swung wide entering the stretch, continued to close and got up late for show. GYURZA stalked the pace, challenged three across on the turn, came up empty late and was caught for third. QUEEN EKATI was through after a half, stopped, bled and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Sequaya
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside to stretch, inched away, dueled late, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Bells of Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2across to 2nd turn, fell back, swung wide, closed, up 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: C C's World
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, awaited room turn, angled out, dueled late, best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Perry Martin, Denise Martin & Vindicate Thoroughbred

ENTRY.NAME: Gyurza
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, challenged 3across turn, empty late, caught for show

ENTRY.NAME: Queen Ekati
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after a half, stopped, bled, vanned off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 2 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 12500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WICKED SUPRISE was a bit crowded at the start, was unhurried early and raced in the back, rallied into the turn, angled out, assumed command entering the stretch, drew off in the drive and was kept to task. CHERRY ORCHARD vied inside, was taken back entering the turn, shifted out, continued willingly and earned place while no match for the winner. JACKPOT BOY broke in, was unhurried early, was roused on the turn, offered a mild bid only and was along for show. ONE ACE settled off the pace mid pack while racing outside, went widest in the drive and lacked a bid. KING ZION vied two across, drew clear into the turn, was headed entering the stretch, weakened and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Cherry Orchard
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, taken back into 2nd turn, shifted out, no match

ENTRY.NAME: King Zion
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2across, drew clear into 2nd turn, weakened drive, faded

ENTRY.NAME: One Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, raced outside, widest in drive, lacked a bid

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Suprise
ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded start, rallied turn, took over into stretch, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Jackpot Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, unhurried early, mild bid only, along for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 87. Maiden Special Weight Purse 35000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAHOE RUN was never far off the pace, raced outside, challenged three across on the turn, assumed command, drew off in the drive and was ridden out. GONE AGAIN was pushed out at the start, pressed the pace to the second turn, challenged for the lead, was outclosed and no match for the winner. ICE AXE was unhurried early, put in an even effort and was along for show. LARRY THE POET veered out at the start, was sent to the front to vie for the lead, weakened in the drive and dropped back steadily. J J'S SOLUTION vied inside, stopped into the far turn and dropped back. RUSSIAN STANDARD stalked the pace along the inside, angled out on the turn, went widest in the drive and lacked a response.

ENTRY.NAME: J J's Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, stopped into 2nd turn, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Russian Standard
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, angled out turn, widest drive, lacked a response

ENTRY.NAME: Tahoe Run
ENTRY.OWNER: Robertson Hugh H Mentz John and Larson Jeff
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced outside,rallied 3across turn, drew off in drive, ridden out

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: John Mentz, Hugh Robertson & Jeff Larson

ENTRY.NAME: Ice Axe
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, even effort, along for sohw

ENTRY.NAME: Larry the Poet
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out start, sent to front, vied to turn, weakened, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Gone Again
ENTRY.OWNER: Ritter Charles W and Becker Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed out start, challenged 2nd turn, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 4 1 1/16M Turf CR: 97. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 37500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 1 24 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since May 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Claiming races for $30,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility). In the event that this race is taken off the turf it will be contested at One Mile and One-Sixteenth on the main track. (Rail at 10 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEMPER TANTRUM stalked the pace, challenged for the lead on the turn, dueled through the stretch and inched clear late. SAILING SOLO sprinted clear to set the pace, responded when challenged to duel for the lead and yielded late to finish second best. PROTONIC POWER raced close to the pace towards the outside, went widest in the drive and closed steadily to get up for show. CADET CORPS saved ground, bid inside on the turn, angled out and lacked the needed late response. CAPTIVATING MOON was a bit hard to load, stalked the pace to the second turn, gave way and was not urged late.

ENTRY.NAME: Cadet Corps
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, bid inside turn, angled out, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Sailing Solo
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace, responded to duel, yielded late,

ENTRY.NAME: Temper Tantrum
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, challenged turn, dueled stretch, clear late,

ENTRY.NAME: Captivating Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: hard to load, stalked to 2nd turn, gave way, not urged late

ENTRY.NAME: Protonic Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, raced outside, widest drive, closed well, up show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 98. Claiming Purse 23000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since May 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Claiming races for $16,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LATIN CASINO was pushed out at the start, raced six wide along the backstretch, dropped inside entering the turn, bid along the rail, altered course mid stretch and surged to get up at the wire. MISTER KELLY raced between horses to the turn, dueled throughout and was outfinished in a game effort. LAKE MILLS raced inside, dueled throughout and was outfinished in a game effort. MEDAL OF FACT broke out, pressed the pace four wide, fell back into the turn and went evenly late. MALPAIS broke out, vied three wide, dropped back leaving the turn and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Mills
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, dueled throughout, outfinished, game effort

ENTRY.NAME: Mister Kelly
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to turn, dueled throughout, game effort

ENTRY.NAME: Malpais
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, vied 3wide, fell back leaving turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Medal of Fact
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, pressed 4wide, fell back into turn, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Latin Casino
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed out start, altered course mid stretch, surged, up wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 15, 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since May 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming races for $4,000 or less not considered in eligib ility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IMPERIAL MOMENT was in tight early, rallied around the turn, swung wide entering the stretch, closed steadily and wore down his rivals to get up in the final strides. GOOD ONE got away well to set the pace with a clear lead, led to deep stretch and was outclosed. HATCHET CREEK chased the pace, swung wide leaving the turn, lacked the needed late response and settled for show. RISKY BOY raced close to the pace, bid inside to loom a threat and hung late. REMEMBER THE MAINE pressed the pace while racing along the rail, fell back into the turn and offered a mild bid only. DEORA STORE raced behind horses, was under restraint from the start to the turn, angled out and was not urged thereafter.

ENTRY.NAME: Remember the Maine
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed rail, fell back into turn, mild bid only

ENTRY.NAME: Deora Store
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind horses, restrained start to turn, angled out, not urged

ENTRY.NAME: Hatchet Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, swung wide leaving turn, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Imperial Moment
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight early, rallied turn,swung wide,wore down rivals, up late

ENTRY.NAME: Good One
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, set pace, clear lead, led to deep stretch, outclosed

ENTRY.NAME: Risky Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, bid inside, loomed a threat, hung

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 7 5 1/2F Turf CR: 92. Allowance Purse 36000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since May 15 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claim ing races for $20,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility). (Rail at 10 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PERUVIAN LUCKY saved ground, bid inside leaving the turn, dueled late and inched away to prove best. FREDDY J bumped at the start, saved ground while never far off the pace, bid inside on the turn to contend and didn't have enough late. ON K P broke out, pressed the pace three wide, challenged on the turn, dueled for the lead, hung late and settled for show. CYCLONE ATTACK was fractious in the gate, bumped at the start, raced outside and failed to rally. HURTS SO BAD raced close to the pace while boxed in and came up empty when clear. FAITHFUL RULER set a pressured pace, stopped mid stretch and dropped back. BALADINE broke in, pressed the pace while racing between horses, was through early and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Peruvian Lucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, bid inside, dueled late, inched away, best

ENTRY.NAME: Hurts So Bad
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close while boxed in, empty when clear, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Cyclone Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, bumped start, raced outside, failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Freddy J
ENTRY.OWNER: Hunsburger Joel B and Black Oak Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, advanced inside turn, closed, not enough late

ENTRY.NAME: Faithful Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, stopped mid stretch, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Baladine
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, pressed between horses, through early, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: On K P
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, pressed 3w, challenged turn, dueled, hung late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 12500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250.

CLAIM.OWNER: Gavilsky II Lawrence J and Throm Keith H

RACE.FOOTNOTES: GETTIN DOWN stumbled at the start, assumed command on the turn, drew off and was ridden out. TWICK OR TWEAT was slow early, saved ground, closed along the rail, was no match for the winner and all out for place. SANGFROID was void of early speed, angled in for the drive, closed through traffic and got up for show. HOLY STAR raced mid pack, swung wide leaving the turn and failed to rally. EVIE JEAN raced mid pack in an even effort and was outrun. VELVET SEASON was off slowly, checked at the start and failed to contend. SHORT STRAW sprinted clear, led to the turn and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Velvet Season
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, checked start, failed to contend

ENTRY.NAME: Twick Or Tweat
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, closed rail, no match, held for place

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, swung wide leaving turn, failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Short Straw
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, led to turn, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Evie Jean
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, even effort, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Sangfroid
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, angled in for drive, closed thru traffic, up 3d

ENTRY.NAME: Gettin Down
ENTRY.OWNER: Patricia's Hope LLC and Down The Stretch Racing Stables Inc (Larry Rivelli)
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, took command turn, drew off, ridden out,
